sentences.sentence: But he did not know what malevolence was.
sentences.translation: 但是他却不知道什么是恶毒。

sentences.sentence: Clone pilot Broadside was last seen in the Season one episode "Shadow of Malevolence".
sentences.translation: 上一次见到克隆人飞行员“舷炮”是在第一季的《毒牙暗影》里。

sentences.sentence: What malevolence you must have to wish to convince me that there is no happiness in the world!
sentences.translation: 你真是多毒辣呀，想让我相信这世界上没有幸福！
